CustomField.formula: IF( Shop_fit_cap_value__c > 0, Shop_fit_cap_value__c , IF( Shop_fit_cap__c > 0, Shop_fit_cap__c * Size_GEA__c , 0) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If a value for the cap is entered it takes preference otherwise the capping amount per village metric if present will be used otherwise the shop fit contribution will not be capped
CustomField.label: Shop Fit Cap (gross)
